## rxGetDependencies() function

Lists all node dependencies of the module

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function rxGetDependencies(aReadText: ReadTextFile, aRoot?: string): Observable<FileDescriptor<any>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  aReadText | <code>ReadTextFile</code> | the read text callback |
|  aRoot | <code>string</code> | the root folder |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Observable<FileDescriptor<any>>`

a listing of the dependencies. The path of the returned [FileDescriptor](./tooling.filedescriptor.md) contains the directory of the package, not the name of the `package.json` file. The value is the `package.json` object.
